original_title: Fried rice, Kottu prices slashed by 10 percent
original_body_lines: All Island Canteen Owners' Association chief Asela Sampath said their association decided to slash the prices of several food items, in line with the recent reduction of LP gas prices.
Accordingly, fried rice and kottu prices will be reduced by 10 percent, Sampath said.
He also urged all restaurants to follow this step to provide relief to the consumers.
